content.raw:
It looks like Jenkins tries to use the ign-math2 functions and fails to compile. That's probably why it only catches some of the warnings. We probably need to fix the situation with sdformat and ign-msgs first:

* https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/298/require-ignition-math3-sdf4/diff

* https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/360/sdformat-use-of-ign-math3/diff

* https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/199

* https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/197
content.html:
It looks like Jenkins tries to use the ign-math2 functions and fails to compile. That's probably why it only catches some of the warnings. We probably need to fix the situation with sdformat and ign-msgs first:

  • https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/298/require-ignition-math3-sdf4/diff

  • https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/360/sdformat-use-of-ign-math3/diff

  • https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/199

  • https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/197
